value.title: Export vs Save as a Power BI Template - Power BI Tips & Tricks #31
value.excerpt: Have you ever wonder why your data is still available in your Power BI file when you saved it as a template?  There are two ways to create a Power BI Template: Export and Save As. value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code.
